plot outline: Can anyone be a victim of demonic possession? Experience this horror flick, which is a portal to hell. The story is about a family, who has relocated from the city to a new place and are currently accommodated in a 400 year old house, which is rumored to be the most haunted house in the realm. After settling in, the family is trapped in the house, but it comes as no surprise that there are paranormal activities of the spirits that have been found throughout the house. How will the family exorcise the house and the ghosts?
